# `PushDeviceInsertRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| deviceToken | `string` | Yes | The device token generated by the network providers |
| notificationProvider | `string` | Yes | The notification provider for the device (FCM / APNS) |
| language | `string` | Yes | The preferred language of the user (eg. en-us, de, fr) |
| deviceType | `string` | Yes | The type of the device (Android / IoS) |
